issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

versions.description: Dev branch for Hive on Spark
versions.name: spark-branch

fields.summary: Making yarn-cluster default for Hive on Spark [Spark Branch]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Looks like in HIVE-9872, wrong patch is committed, and therefore TestSparkSessionManagerImpl will still fail. This JIRA should fix it.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12703970 - PreCommit-HIVE-SPARK-Build
Test failures are not related, although we do need to look at union12, and union31. They probably came from HIVE-9569.

+1

The union related test failures will be addressed in HIVE-9924.
Committed to Spark branch. Thanks Xuefu for reviewing!
